entity.name: Dr. Phil
entity.description: Dr. Phillip C. McGraw's show draws on his 25 years of experience in psychology, sociology and observation. Beginning his TV career as the resident expert on human behavior on Oprah Winfrey's daily talk show, Dr. Phil continues to deal with real issues in his blunt style.

domain.name: TV Shows

entity.name: The Dr. Oz Show
entity.description: After five years as a health expert on "The Oprah Winfrey Show," Dr. Mehmet Oz gets an hour of his own each weekday to discuss viewers' health-and-wellness concerns. No subject is off-limits, as Dr. Oz addresses viewers' questions and talks to health experts about any and all topics, from sex to diet and exercise to diseases and ways to avoid them.

text: @DrOz You are a bought shill. I've stopped watching your program as all you seem to want to do is validate the Presidents call that an anti-malaria is the proper drug to solve the COVID-19 crisis. You and Dr. Phil are a disgrace.
